snippet: We dont sell COnnect Pods, we make em better
name: Adobe Connet Pod

drumrolls.Footprints: The Carbon and Cost Savings Calculator for Adobe Connect.
drumrolls.hands up: Make your Adobe Connect meetings fun and interactive.
drumrolls.Cachet: A jitter-free HD video playback app that makes sharing web videos in Adobe Connect fast and easy even with users with unreliable connectivity.
